channel.title: Use and item with an object?
channel.description:
Hello :)
Well, I know how to make it if you use and item with an item it will delete them both and add another item,
But i was wondering,
I'm making a minigame, and at the end, you have to use a key you get with a chest
but i dont know how I would make it work, I dont know what I would put in client.java
If anyone could help me, that'd be great!
Key ID = 293 Chest ID = 2191
Thanks!

item.title: Use and item with an object?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Scroll up above the first if (itemUsed == statement. You should see Integer definitions, one being the object. (use that instead of atObjectID)

Read full topic
item.source: Use and item with an object?

item.title: Use and item with an object?
item.dc:creator: @Gratlofatic Gratlofatic
item.description:
@Gratlofatic wrote:

this is what i get in errors:

client.java:12138: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable atObjectID
location: class client
if ((itemUsed == 293) && (atObjectID == 2191)) {
^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: Use and item with an object?

item.title: Use and item with an object?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Don’t use break; replace with a }

item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

after break;
press enter and put

} =)

		if ((itemUsed == 293) && (atObjectID == 2191)) {
    				deleteItem(293, getItemSlot(293), 1);

item.source: Use and item with an object?

item.title: Use and item with an object?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

getItemSlot is exactly as it says. Gets the slot. Same ID of what you’re deleting.

Read full topic
item.source: Use and item with an object?

item.title: Use and item with an object?
item.dc:creator: @Gratlofatic Gratlofatic
item.description:
@Gratlofatic wrote:

thanks man[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2009, 11:03:57 am[/size][hr]ehm, with “deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1);”

I know the deleteItem(#### is my key, but whats the getItemSlot(####)?

THanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2009, 11:12:41 am[/size][hr]anyone

Read full topic
item.source: Use and item with an object?

item.title: Use and item with an object?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Heres the format

} else if (useItemID == #### && atObjectID == ####) // @@@@ { deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1); addItem(####,1); sendMessage("@@@@@@@");
Replace all the # with the correct number, and the @ with letters.

Read full topic
